## Class Readings

Required text, available online via Baruch Newman Library.

- Newcomer, Kathryn E., Harry P. Hatry, and Joseph S. Wholey. 2015. [Handbook of Practical Program Evaluation](https://cuny-bb.primo.exlibrisgroup.com/permalink/01CUNY_BB/1r6p7jg/alma9994414097806122). Fourth ed. San Francisco, CA: Jossey-Bass. [Hereafter, “Handbook”].
- Gertler, Paul; Martinez, Sebastian; Rawlings, Laura B.; Premand, Patrick; Vermeersch, Christel M. J. 2016. [Impact Evaluation in Practice](https://www.worldbank.org/en/programs/sief-trust-fund/publication/impact-evaluation-in-practice). World Bank. [Hereafter, “Practice”]
- Other readings and materials will be posted on Brightspace.

## Grading

Final grades will be calculated as follows:

<div style="width:550px">
Item                           | Weight | Notes
-------------------------------|--------|-------------------------------------
Case study responses           | 50 %   | 5 cases
Project: Proposal              | 10 %   | 
Project: Presentation          | 20 %   |
Project: Final report          | 20 %   |

</div>
